title: Counter Strike
description: Experience one of the most well-known FPS classics in all its glory.

events.title: Game Night: CS:GO Arms Race
events.description: Brace yourselves, as we've crafted exclusive Fractal Game Night custom servers with a electrifying game mode: Arms Race! Get in the game, score big on the live leaderboard, and seize your chance to claim a share of the $300 prize pool!
events.rules:
Key Points

  • Event will be hosted in the Fractal Discord Server on the Game Night Stage
  • Event will be hosted in Portuguese and English
  • We'll be playing CS:GO Arms Race

CS:GO Arms Race Game Night Format

CS: GO will be an async game night meaning everyone who comes to play in our servers will be posting scores to a live leaderboard!

Players spawn with the weapon on his or her current level as well as the knife. For every two kills on a particular level, the player will receive a new weapon by leveling up to the next level. The gold knife is the final weapon a player receives, and the first player to score a kill with the gold knife wins the game along with his or her team.

When game night starts, join one of the Fractal Community servers and start playing. If the server is full try another one until you get in. You'll be putting up points onto the leaderboard as you play and the top scores at the end of the night will receive part of a $200 prize pool!

For the secret mission, only the 5 first players who cracks the case will get a part of the bonus $100 prize pool, so be fast and be smart!

Prizes

Leaderboard Rank Prize

1st Place

$20 USD
2nd Place

How to prepare for Game Night

  • Create a Fractal account if you don't have one (Prizes will only be sent to Fractal wallets)
  • Link your Discord and Steam accounts to your Fractal account in your Account Profile (Scores will only be sent if your accounts are linked)
  • Download CS:GO from Steam before game night: https://store.steampowered.com/app/730/CounterStrike_Global_Offensive/

How to Join Game Night

To join game night, click on the game night stage ‚Å†in the Fractal Discord server at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!

Pontos Chave

  • O evento será realizado no servidor do Discord da Fractal, no Stage da Game Night
  • O evento será realizado em Português e Inglês
  • Iremos jogar o modo corrida armada do CS: GO

Formato da Game Night de Corrida Armada no CS: GO

A Game Night de CS:GO será uma game night não simultânea, o que significa que todos que vierem jogar em nossos servidores terão suas pontuações enviadas para um placar ao vivo!

Jogadores spawnam com a arma do seu nível atual e com uma faca. A cada dois abates em um nível específico, o jogador receberá uma nova arma ao subir para o próximo nível. A faca dourada é a arma final que um jogador pode receber, e o primeiro jogador a conseguir um abate com a faca dourada vence o jogo junto com sua equipe.

Quando a Game Night começar, entre em um dos servidores da comunidade da Fractal e comece a jogar. Se o servidor estiver cheio, tente outro até você conseguir entrar. Você irá acumular pontos no placar a medida que joga, e as melhores pontuações ao final da Game Night receberão parte do prêmio total de $200 dólares!

Para a missão secreta, apenas os 5 primeiros que desvendarem o caso vão ganhar parte da premiação bônus, então seja esperto e seja rápido.

Como se preparar para Game Night:

  • Crie uma conta na Fractal, caso ainda não tenha uma (As premiações serão enviadas apenas para carteiras da Fractal)
  • Linke sua conta do Discord com a sua conta da Fractal na aba "Account Profile" (A pontuação só seria enviada para tabela se sua conta estiver corretamente linkada)
  • Baixe o CS:GO pela Steam antes da game night começar: https://store.steampowered.com/app/730/CounterStrike_Global_Offensive/

Como participar da Game Night

Para participar da Game Night, clique no stage da Game Night ‚Å†no Discord da Fractal na hora definida. Ajustem seus alarmes e estejam lá! Esse é um evento ao vivo, então NÃO SE ATRASE!

events.title: CS:GO Streamer Showdown
events.description: Play alongside your favorite streamers in a giant multi-server C4 mode match in CS:GO!
events.rules:
GET READY FOR THE BIGGEST GAME NIGHT EVENT EVER:  The Streamer Showdown! 

Side with one of Brazil's top web3 gaming streamers and invite your friends to compete against the other team and make Fractal Game Night history!

Are you #teamlombra, the Brazilian otter, enemy of making profits
Or #teamminharte, chicken impersonator, and prettiest mustache alive?

Tell the world who you're playing for on twitter!

üí∞ Prizes: $200 for leaderboard scores
üí∞ Prizes: $100 split to the winning team
üí∞ Bonus: $100 for secret missions

üéÆ Streamer Showdown Format: üéÆ On Tuesday July 25, 2023, pick a team to represent by typing !team in the Fractal Discord Server, then on July 27, 2023, you'll be assigned to a 10v10 c4 standard mode server, where you'll represent the streamer that you chose! You'll be putting up points on the leaderboard as you get kills, assists, plant, and defuse bombs. The top scores at the end of the night will receive part of a $200 prize pool, and the winning team will wager an additional $100! There will also be 5 secret missions that any player can unlock throughout the night worth $20 each! We will give clues but it will be up to you to figure them out and win!

Cheating will not be tolerated, we are going to record every player's perspective, if you get caught cheating you'll be perma-banned and your whole team will be disqualified.

How to prepare for Game Night:

  • Link your discord and steam accounts to your Fractal here: https://www.fractal.is/account?t=Profile
  • Download CS:GO from Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/730/CounterStrike_Global_Offensive/
  • Register your team pick by typing !team on July 25, 2023 in the Fractal discord server
  • Add Fractal's community servers to your favorites in CS:GO (list of servers will be available at the beginning of our Game Night)

When the event begins, load up CS:GO and click on the game night stage in the Fractal Discord server at the right time to join the fun!

events.title: CS:GO Game Night
events.description: Come join the one and only Fractal Game Night and win F points and cash prize rewards! Play in custom servers with the Fractal community and put up points on the leaderboard. Solve secret quests for a total bonus of $100. Jump in and see you soon!
events.rules:
CS: GO once again!? We've spun up some custom servers with different game modes in CS: GO just for Fractal Game Night!

Join Fractal Discord and put up points on the leaderboard during the live event to take home part of the $200 prize pool! We will also have secret quest (what are those emojis at the end of the announcement?) for a total bonus of $100, be ready to try new things on our servers! 

Prizes: $200 in prizepool and giveaways 

Bonus: $100 for secret missions

How to prepare for Game Night

Link your discord account to your Fractal wallet by typing !link in ‚Å†üçª‚îÇgame-night (if you receive a green check mark you set up correctly).

  • Link your steam account to your Fractal account by typing !steam in any channel and following the instructions.
  • Download CS:GO from Steam here
  • Add Fractal's community servers to your favorites (list of servers will be available at the beginning of our Game Night)

Game Night Format

CS: GO will be an async game night meaning everyone who comes to play in our servers will be posting scores to a live leaderboard!

When game night starts, join one of the Fractal Community servers and start playing. If the server is full try another one until you get in. You'll be putting up points onto the leaderboard as you play and the top scores at the end of the night will receive part of a $200 prize pool! For the secret mission, only the 5 first players who cracks the case will get a part of the bonus prize, so be fast and be smart. 

Join Game Night Right Now

To join game night, join Fractal Discord and click on the game night stage at the right time. This is a live event so DON'T BE LATE!
